string.text: Rotten stump
Found a stump with good space on a hill with anomalies. About time I drop off some loot.
Barracks
I saw a box with different kinds of supplies in the milstalker barracks. Can't just walk in there in broad daylight, but damn if I'm not tempted...
Box under power line
An iron box within a field of electroanomalies? Perfect spot for a stash.
Supplies
I found a nice space for extra loot in a box that was once used for chemical substances. I'll leave it here for now and retrieve it later if nothing rots.
Forgotten grave
Near the old passage to Yantar, I saw a stalker stuff some things into an abandoned grave. Guy's got no heart!
Cross on the outskirts
I decided to bring my friend's things to his grave. Can't just keep it around forever. Let him have them.
Stump by trail
I had to drop off my heaviest gear near the gate to the Garbage while running from boars. I hope I can get back to the stash later and that no one touches it.
Inconspicuous stash
I saw a case by the unhinged door in the helipad building where an egghead looked to be hiding stuff. Maybe he's stealing surplus materials?
Army stash
I just overheard a conversation between two COs. One was boasting about a cache with some big-time loot... which, as it turns out, was snatched from stalker corpses.
High-rise cache
While climbing the roofs, I saw a guy on a tower rummaging around something for at least ten minutes. Looks like I know his hiding place.
Stump by hillside
I'll be keeping the goods in a rotten swump on the way to the tunnel. Once I tie up all loose ends, I'll be back for it.
Official transport
I'll leave a case with my stuff in this old rusty Niva. Can't carry this junk around all the time.
Small case
I stashed some loot by the tunnel that I won't be needing anytime soon. Just hope no one snoops around.
Pipe in hole
Found an old pipe in a hole once dug up by snorks. I'd say this'll be a nice place for my stuff.
Stash in thicket
Hid part of my loot in the thick bushes under the heating main. Think I'll come back for it on a rainy day.
Blockage
Found a sizeable pipe in the rubble blocking the stairwell to the underground. Could be useful for hiding stuff.
Worn backpack
I found a backpack with all sorts of goods near a soldier's corpse. Area's wide open, so I didn't stick my neck out. People could chase me.
Hill
I found a backpack with loot in a tent near the digger camp. Will come back here in a couple of days and grab it if the owner doesn't show up.
In the ashes
Saw a stalker through my binoculars as he threw his backpack on top of the anomalous protrusions. Didn't get what that was all about, and then he got detained by the military for some reason.
Sunken transport
The front part of the sunken UAZ is still intact. Guess I'll leave my backpack there. Wouldn't want it with me if I get put under pressure by the bandit shits at the Garbage.
Under the vent
Fat chance anyone will try getting into the center of a chemical anomaly. I found a ventilation spot where I'll drop off some of my loot.
Covered by foliage
Made a stash on the roof of the building, nicely covered by a nearby growing tree. I'll be back for it in a week if I get the chance.
Middle of the forest
Found a big log in the forest on the outskirts. Should leave excess gear in it, or else my backpack will tear open.
Hidden safe
Caught a soldier rummaging in some safe by the scientific complex. Probably bringing something from the base. I either clear out his stuff or tell his commander... gotta give it some thought.
Safe in bins
Was visiting my friend in the digger area. Found an empty safe in a container that no one's using. They allowed me leave my things there for a small fee.
Log by the road
There's an obscure place near the exit to the Garbage with good loot.
Unreachable backpack
There's this little spot in the digger base where a guy'd dropped off his loot. He's left the Zone by now, and never decided to retrieve his stuff.
Under wagon
I know a place where a pretty rich stalker hides his stuff. Happened to overhear his conversation with a pal.
On the roof
There's this stash that's literally close by. Just make sure the soldiers don't see you.
Don't enter — you'll die
Here are the coordinates to my hiding place, as thanks for helping me with those dogs. If it weren't for you, they'd have me for dinner by now.
